title: The Merck Manual Home Health Handbook, 3rd edition - epub, mobi
description:
**********Description***********


English | ISBN: 0911910301 | 2010 | 4470 Pages | EPUB, MOBI | 71 MB

For the past twenty years the publishers of THE MERCK MANUAL, one of the most widely used sources of medical information in the world, realised that more and more copies of the guide were being purchased by people who were not healthcare professionals, despite the fact that it had never been advertised and was not written for public use. Recognising the public's increasing need for access to the same medical information doctors have, Merck responded with the HOME EDITION. This contained virtually all the information in the physician's version, but in easy-to-understand, everyday language, with a reader-friendly format. Since its publication three years ago the HOME EDITION has gone on to sell more than 2 million copies worldwide. Now Merck have updated the edition to cater for the changing medical environment. The new edition contains new chapters on subjects ranging from Gene Therapy Heart disease Cancer Nutrition problems Hormonal problems Men's, women's and children's health issues

The Merck Manual â€” Home Health Handbook is a clear, comprehensive reference that covers the whole family - - newborns, older adults, and everyone in between.

This new book features an in-depth pediatrics section and a broad discussion on coping with the changes of aging and caregiving.

Covers a Wide Array of Medical Topics:

Swine Flu
Aging
Heart disorders
Cancer
And many more!

Written by more than 300 medical experts, The Merck Manual Home Health Handbook brings the latest medical insights to the everyday reader and continues the best-selling tradition from Merck, which is know as MSD outside of U.S.A and Canada.
